name: Takakaro Village
description:
Explore the cute village of Takakaro and take care of your fellow villagers!

Move - Arrow keys or WASD
Items - 1, 2, 3, 4

——————————————

A short, relaxing game made for Extra Credits Game Jam #6 using the theme "Take Care".

By: Anita Hayden, Sean Hayden
Music: PeriTune - Guitar Gentle, Music Box Pleasant
